sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"目标，目的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: aim, goal, purpose, end, target, object, objective
means: aim ：从本义"靶子"引申而来，侧重比较具体而明确的目标，但常指短期目标。
goal ：指经过考虑和选择，需经坚持不懈的努力奋斗才能达到的最终目标。
purpose ：普通用词，既指以坚决、审慎的行动去达到的目的，又指心中渴望要实际的目标。
end ：指心目中怀着的某种目的，强调结果而非过程。较正式用词。
target ：指射击的靶，军事攻击目标。引申指被攻击、批评或潮笑的目标。
object ：强调个人或需求而决定的目标、目的。
objective ：与object基本同义，但语义更广泛，指具体或很快能达到的目的，也可指军事目标。书面用词。

sentence.Network_en: Most of them are destroyed because they've served their purpose.
sentence.Network_cn: 它们中大多数在完成使命后被销毁。

sentence.Network_en: What'simpressed me has been his considerable firmness of purpose.
sentence.Network_cn: 令我印象深刻的是他对目标的坚定不移。

sentence.Network_en: The purpose of the visit was to navigate into an ice-filled fiord.
sentence.Network_cn: 这次出行是为了能驶入冰雪覆盖的峡湾。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 目录 1 2 3 ▪ ▪ ▪ 4 1简介Skopos这一术语通常用来指译文的目的，Skopos一词来源于希腊语目的“Skopos“。除了Skopos，还使用了相关的“目标(aim)“、“目的(purpose)“、“意图(intention)“和“功能(function)“等词。为了避免概念混淆，提议对意图和.

main pump 主泵main purpose 主要目的main push-towing rope 主推拖缆

jx.jx_en_mean: with no result or effect; pointlessly

与本题有关的，得要领的，合适的；有用的

lj.lj_ly: you may have heard something from them which is to the purpose.
lj.lj_ls: 你或许已从他们那儿听到了一些有关的事情。

jx.jx_cn_mean: 几乎徒劳的，少有成效地

phrase.cizu_name: to little purpose 或 to no purpose

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French porpos, from the verb porposer, variant of proposer (see propose)

encyclopedia.content: 词源 13世纪晚期，直接源自古法语的porpos: por(向前）+pos(放），意为放向前。释义 音标 Phonetic symbol ['pe:pes] 词性及解释 Part of speech and defination n. 目的， 意向， 决心， 用途， 效果， 论题 vt. 意欲， 企图， 计划 【法】 目的， 意向， 决心用法： 及物动词vt. 1.书意图；决意；打算[+to-v][+v-ing][+that]He purposesto visit Taipei. 他打算访问台北。‍ 2. 目的，意图[C] What is the purpose of

entry.def: The purpose of something is the reason for which it is made or done.

example.ex: The purpose of the occasion was to raise money for medical supplies...
example.tran: 那次活动是为筹集资金购买医药物资。

example.ex: Various insurance schemes already exist for this purpose.
example.tran: 已经有各种保险计划可以实现这一目的。

entry.def: Your purpose is the thing that you want to achieve.

example.ex: They might well be prepared to do you harm in order to achieve their purpose...
example.tran: 为达成自己的目的，他们说不定已经做好了伤害你的准备。

example.ex: His purpose was to make a profit by improving the company's performance.
example.tran: 他的目标是通过提高公司的业绩来实现盈利。

entry.def: Purpose is the feeling of having a definite aim and of being determined to achieve it.

example.ex: The teachers are enthusiastic and have a sense of purpose.
example.tran: 教师们很热情并且很有决心。

entry.def: You use for all practical purposes or to all intents and purposes to suggest that a situation is not exactly as you describe it, but the effect is the same as if it were.

example.ex: For all practical purposes the treaty has already ceased to exist...
example.tran: 实际上协议已经不复存在。

example.ex: To all intents and purposes the case was closed.
example.tran: 实际上该案已经了结了。

entry.def: If you do something on purpose, you do it intentionally.

example.ex: Was it an accident or did David do it on purpose?
example.tran: 是意外还是戴维故意所为？

means.word_mean: 1. an anticipated outcome that is intended or that guides your planned actions;

sentences.sentence: "his intent was to provide a new translation"
"it was created with the conscious aim of answering immediate needs"
"he made no secret of his designs"
"the function of an auger is to bore holes"
"ballet is beautiful but what use is it?"

means.word_mean: 3. the quality of being determined to do or achieve something;

sentences.sentence: "his determination showed in his every movement"

Sentence.sentence: What is the author's purpose in writing the passage?
Its purpose is to build and maintain bone and muscle mass, both of which shrink with age.
What is the purpose of California's rule about alcohol display in gas stations
What is the chief purpose of all the countermeasures taken?
What is the author's purpose in writing the passage?
The purpose of the speech was to encourage the audience of corporate executives and local business owners to support local sports groups.

sentences.en: He returned to his homeland with the purpose of serving his own people.
sentences.cn: 他返回祖国, 意在为祖国人民服务。

means.word_mean: 作用; 用途; 效果

sentences.en: This machine serves a double purpose.

means.word_mean: 意志; 毅力; 决心

sentences.en: I know she is steady in her purpose.

sentences.cn: 他们意图做进一步的尝试。

sentences.en: He purposes to write the history of India.
He purposed that he would marry after graduation.

jushi.english: A person who is weak of purpose cannot hope to achieve much.
jushi.chinese: 一个没有决心的人不可能指望有所成就。

jushi.english: What you say is foreign to our purpose.
jushi.chinese: 你的话和我们的目的无关。

jushi.english: I bought it for a specific purpose.
jushi.chinese: 我为特定的目的买了它。
